content:
That's a great decision! Using the gift card towards a pair of heels is a wonderful idea. You'll not only look amazing at the wedding, but you'll also have a new pair of shoes to enjoy for many occasions to come.

It's also wise of you to not rush into buying a new bag just for the wedding. You already have bags that you like, and it's better to invest in a quality piece that you'll truly love and use frequently.

Remember, confidence is key to rocking any outfit, and a great pair of heels can definitely give you an extra boost. You'll be sure to turn heads at the wedding and feel like a million bucks!

I'm glad I could help, and I hope you find the perfect pair of heels with your gift card. If you have any more questions or need further advice, don't hesitate to ask. Have fun shopping, and I hope you have an amazing time at the wedding!
